articles.author: Felix Keith
articles.title: Liverpool transfer round-up: Klopp personally involved in Man Utd hijack as he eyes two deals - The Mirror
articles.description: Liverpool have moved for Stuttgart's Wataru Endo and are now chasing two more transfers before the window closes, with Jurgen Klopp desperate for reinforcements
articles.content:
What a difference a day makes. Liverpool went from missing out on the signings of Moises Caicedo and Romeo Lavia to moving for Wataru Endo in the blink of an eye. 
As reported by Mirror Football, th… [+2989 chars]

articles.author: Fraser Watson
articles.title: Liverpool plot move for Premier League star Jurgen Klopp wanted five years ago - The Mirror
articles.description: It's been a frustrating time for Liverpool in the transfer window after missing out on Moises Caicedo and Romeo Lavia despite having bids for both players accepted
articles.content:
Jurgen Klopp could be about to go back to the future in order to solve Liverpool's current midfield crisis.
The Anfield boss has endured a week of pure frustration in the summer transfer market. The… [+2795 chars]
